awards.name: Best Killer
awards.description: The fattest fragger of this war.

awards.name: Best Scrap Scooper
awards.description: They who hopefully had ClickLock enabled.

awards.name: Best Logi
awards.description: Remembered to set their officer uniform MPF queues.

awards.name: Best Medic
awards.description: A shirt saved is a shirt earned.

awards.name: ECH Man Bad Award
awards.description: The model ECHman, whose friendly fire damage meets exceeds their enemy damage.

awards.name: Touch Grass Award
awards.description: As Marshal, I cannot fully endorse nor encourage this medal. Unless you have a sun or grass allergy, please try to go outside. Walk the cat or something.
